title: On groups well represented as automorphism groups of groups
authors: Mohsen Asgharzadeh, Mohammad Golshani, Daniel Herden, Saharon Shelah
abstract:
Assuming G\"{o}del's axiom of constructibility $\bold V=\bold L,$ we present
a characterization of those groups $L$ for which there exist arbitrarily large
groups $H$ such that $aut(H) \cong L$. In particular, we show that it suffices
to have one such group $H$ such that the size of its center is bigger than $
2^{|L |+\aleph_0}$.
